title: The Paper kite
creator_credit: Ivo Caprino, UNICEF, Caprino Films and National Film Board of Norway
brief_description: Depicts the dream of a Norwegian boy about the magic of UNICEF aid, in which puppets tell an entertaining and fanciful story of how UNICEF-aided projects bring hope and well-being to children all over the world.
creator_credit_for_label: Ivo Caprino, UNICEF, Caprino Films and National Film Board of Norway
